articles.description: The world's biggest PS5 is 10-feet high, 500 pounds, and it costs $70,000, or at least that's what mega-popular YouTuber, ZHC, recently paid for the ginormous console. The standard PS5 is one of the biggest modern consoles ever, which has created problems for…
